messages.author: Station Earnings Report
messages.body:
Sector Economic Report

Sector vendor prices is currently at 170%, but company countermeasures protect YOU from being affected!

The station spending power is currently 150 Credits, and the crew's targeted allowance is at 87 Credits.

That's all from the Nanotrasen Economist Division.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security level elevated.

The station has received reliable information about possible hostile activity on the station. Security staff may have weapons visible, random searches are permitted. A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Station Earnings Report
messages.body:
Sector Economic Report

Sector vendor prices is currently at 170%, but company countermeasures protect YOU from being affected!

The station spending power is currently 475 Credits, and the crew's targeted allowance is at 143 Credits.

Large Drop! Australicus Industrial Mining has been hit with a major lawsuit, resulting in a price drop for iron.
Market Reset! MODular Solutions restructured, resetting the price of glass.
Large Boost! Australicus Industrial Mining has just released a new product that raised the price of gold.
Market Reset! Australicus Industrial Mining was purchased by a private investment firm, resetting the price of bluespace crystal.
That's all from the Nanotrasen Economist Division.

messages.author: Station Earnings Report
messages.body:
Sector Economic Report

Sector vendor prices is currently at 160%, but company countermeasures protect YOU from being affected!

The station spending power is currently 550 Credits, and the crew's targeted allowance is at 168 Credits.

Large Boost! Vey-Medical has produced a report that raised the price of gold.
Lockdown! Aussec Armory , in a stunning move, has been embargoed by TerraGov, resulting in a halt of trade of diamond.
Market Reset! Nakamura Engineering restructured, resetting the price of bluespace crystal.
That's all from the Nanotrasen Economist Division.

messages.author: Station Earnings Report
messages.body:
Sector Economic Report

Sector vendor prices is currently at 160%, but company countermeasures protect YOU from being affected!

The station spending power is currently 615 Credits, and the crew's targeted allowance is at 193 Credits.

Selling like Hotcakes! Aussec Armory , in a surprise move, monopolized supply and has raised the price of diamond.
Large Boost! Robust Industries, LLC discovered a new valuable use for uranium.
Large Drop! SolGov has been hit with a major lawsuit, resulting in a price drop for silver.
Selling like Hotcakes! Dreamland Robotics has just released a new product that is dominating the market for silver.
That's all from the Nanotrasen Economist Division.

messages.author: Station Earnings Report
messages.body:
Sector Economic Report

Sector vendor prices is currently at 100%, but company countermeasures protect YOU from being affected!

The station spending power is currently 690 Credits, and the crew's targeted allowance is at 145 Credits.

Lockdown! Nakamura Engineering , in a stunning move, has been embargoed by TerraGov, resulting in a halt of trade of uranium.
Large Boost! Dreamland Robotics discovered a new valuable use for silver.
Large Drop! MODular Solutions has been hit with a major lawsuit, resulting in a price drop for gold.
Selling like Hotcakes! Vey-Medical , in a surprise move, monopolized supply and has raised the price of diamond.
Large Drop! Aussec Armory has been hit with a major lawsuit, resulting in a price drop for silver.
Lockdown! Dreamland Robotics is being investigated by the Galactic Trade Commission, resulting in a halt of trade for iron.
That's all from the Nanotrasen Economist Division.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
ERT Request

Central command has responded to your request for a CODE VIOLET Emergency Response Team and have confirmed one to be enroute.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Mead Environment Nineteen have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Mead Environment Nineteen. We apologize for the inconvenience.

Sector Economic Report

Sector vendor prices is currently at 100%, but company countermeasures protect YOU from being affected!

The station spending power is currently 840 Credits, and the crew's targeted allowance is at 195 Credits.

Market Reset! Aussec Armory has been rolled into a larger company, resetting the price of iron.

Selling like Hotcakes! Robust Industries, LLC has just released a new product that is dominating the market for bluespace crystal.
Large Drop! Vey-Medical 's latest product has seen major controversy, and resulted in a price drop for uranium.
That's all from the Nanotrasen Economist Division.

messages.author: Nanotrasen Stock Report
messages.body:
Thank you for reading the Nanotrasen Stock Report. Due to quarterly earnings reports exceeding expectations by several percent, the Nanotrasen Incorporated stock has jumped 5%, one of the largest in months.

Originally published on: 9/26/2562
